rooms.description: A welcoming space with Mediterranean-style arches and stone accents to introduce the farmhouse aesthetic.
An open-plan area that maximizes natural light through large windows; includes seating areas that encourage family gatherings while ensuring good ventilation.
Compact yet functional Mediterranean kitchen with modern finishes and ample storage, adjacent to dining space for convenience.
A quiet zone optimized for work or study, positioned towards the east to harness morning sunlight in accordance with Vastu principles.
Dedicated multimedia space with soundproofing and integrated lighting control, designed to enhance the movie-watching experience while maintaining a cosy atmosphere.
Flexibly used for guest accommodation or additional storage; incorporates Mediterranean design elements.

openings.location: north side of the entrance hall
